name: Volley Shot
description: Bullets +1, DMG -15%.

name: Bullets Boost
description: Bullets DMG +50%.

name: Piercing Bullet
description: Bullet Penetration +1.

name: Volley Shot +
description: Bullets +1.

name: Rapid Fire
description: Fire rate +20%.

name: Bullet Explosion
description: 10% chance to explode on hit.

name: Charge Activation
description: Guardian enters Charged State, gaining Charge Points by firing bullets.

name: Shotgun Evolution
description: Each shot scatters 2 additional sub-bullets.

name: Splitting Bullet
description: Bullets split into 1 sub-bullet; 2 sub-bullets in Charged State.

name: Impact Bullet
description: Bullet DMG +100%, with weak knockback; knockback +200% in Charged State.

name: Explosion Expansion
description: Explosion range +50%.

name: Quick Charge
description: Charge Points from Bullets +100%.

name: Sustained Charge
description: In Charged State, number of shots fired +100%.

name: Penetration Boost
description: All bullets penetration +2.

name: Reflection Boost
description: All bullets reflection +2.

name: Flame Bullet
description: Bullets become flame bullets, adding extra fire DMG on hit.

name: Electric Bullet
description: When bullets kill an enemy, there is a 50% chance to trigger a Small Lightning Strike.

name: Counterburst Scatter
description: After every 40 shots, the guardian fires a wave of Penetrating Shotgun Shells.

name: Explosion Boost
description: Explosion DMG +60%, explosion chance +10%.

name: Laser Shot
description: 20% chance to trigger a Ripping Laser when hitting enemies with bullets.

name: Disruption Fire
description: All bullets dealing damage to enemies, 10% chance inflicts 1 stack of [Disruption] effect.

name: Mirror Guardian
description: Creates a clone guardian that deals 50% of the guardian's DMG (Unlock at Lv.21).

name: Volley Missile
description: Sky Guard Missile +1, DMG -15%.

name: Sky Guard Boost
description: Sky Guard Missile DMG +50%.

name: Explosion Spread
description: Explosion range +30%.

name: Impact Reinforcement
description: After hitting target, launches 3 Small Missiles dealing impact DMG.

name: Ignition
description: Enemies hit receive [Burn] effect.

name: Burning Area
description: Missiles leave a burning area that lasts for 5s after exploding.

name: Impact Multiplier
description: All Sky Guard Missiles' impact DMG +200%.

name: Missile Amplification
description: Small Sky Guard Missiles +3.

name: Ignition Amplification
description: [Burn] DMG +100%.

name: Thermal Warhead
description: Small Sky Guard Missiles have a 60% chance to explode upon hitting enemies (Unlock at Lv.22).

name: Strong Impact
description: Sky Guard Missile +2.

name: Close-range Explosion
description: After hitting a target, triggers an additional strong explosion in nearby area (Unlock at Lv.14).

name: Collapse Explosion
description: Creates a Small Black Hole after the Sky Guard Missile exploded.

name: Chain Reaction
description: Small Sky Guard Missiles have a 60% chance to launch an additional Small Missile.

name: Death Ignition
description: Triggers an explosion when an enemy dies while under [Burn] effect.

name: Fire Transmission
description: Sky Guard Missiles apply [Burn] effect to enemies they pass through.

name: Detonation Thunderbolt
description: Generates a stationary small Thunderbolt for 5s after Sky Guard missiles kill enemies.

name: Path Strike
description: Sky Guard Missiles deal DMG to enemies along their path.

name: Laser Amplification
description: Laser DMG +50%.

name: Stable Energy
description: Laser duration +40%.

name: Laser Reflection
description: Laser reflection +1, DMG -20% per reflection.

name: Additional Sweep
description: Fires 1 additional Sweeping Laser.

name: Energy Surge
description: Fires 2 additional Deflected Lasers.

name: High-Energy Pulse
description: Laser DMG Range +100%.

name: Multi-Strike
description: Laser duration +100%, cooldown speed +20%.

name: Vulnerable Laser
description: Enemies hit by Sweeping Lasers receive [Vulnerable] effect.

name: Slow Laser
description: Enemies hit by Deflected Lasers receive [Slow] effect.

name: Energy Overload
description: Debuff duration from all Lasers +100%.

name: Tear Explosion
description: 20% chance to trigger a Ripping Laser when hitting enemies with Laser.

name: Energy Boost
description: Laser DMG +60% for each debuff on enemies (MAX: 300%) (Unlock at Lv.18).

name: Energy Paralysis
description: Enemies hit by Laser receive [Paralyze] effect.

name: Graviton Laser
description: Lasers create a pull effect in nearby enemies (Unlock at Lv.22).

name: Sweep Boost
description: Sweeping Laser sweeps once again.

name: Deflected Laser Reflection
description: Deflected Laser reflections +1 (Unlock at Lv.14).

name: Energy Detonation
description: All Lasers hitting enemies with [Burn] effect will trigger an Ignition Explosion.

name: Convergence Trigger
description: 30% chance to generate a Refracted Beam upon Laser hitting enemies.

name: Field Amplification
description: Disruption Field DMG +50%.

name: Field Duration
description: Disruption Field duration +30%.

name: Field Expansion
description: Disruption Field DMG Range +30%.

name: Disruption Force
description: Each time Disruption Field deals damage to enemies, it inflicts 1 stack of [Disruption].

name: Random Disturbance
description: Enemies hit by Disruption Field have a 5% chance to be teleported back a certain distance.

name: Final Blast
description: Disruption Field causes explosion DMG when it ends.

name: Stasis Field
description: Each time enemies take damage from Disruption Field, [Slow] effect +10% (MAX: 90%).

name: Disruption Burst
description: When [Disruption] effect reaches MAX stacks, deals 1 high burst DMG.

name: Rewind Teleport
description: Enemies hit by Disruption Field have a 2.5% chance to be transported to start point.

name: Overcharged Disruption
description: [Disruption] DMG +100%, maximum stack count changed to 5 stacks (Unlock at Lv.22).

name: Quick Cooldown
description: Disruption Drone DMG Interval -30%, cooldown speed +30%.

name: Field Suppression
description: Enemies in the Disruption Field take increased additional DMG based on their reduced speed (MAX: 200%).

name: Small Laser
description: A Sweeping Laser is generated in the center of Disruption Drone.

name: Electric Field
description: Enemies hit by Disruption Field have a 30% chance to be inflicted [Paralyze].

name: Area Disruption
description: When [Disruption] effect reaches MAX stacks, deals 1 extra DMG.

name: Teleport Damage
description: Teleportation from the Disruption Field deals 3% of the target's MAX HP as DMG.

name: Converging Field
description: Disruption Drone DMG +100%, each DMG pulls enemies toward the center (Unlock at Lv.18).

name: Fortress Support
description: Launch an additional set of Disruption Drones above Fortress.

name: Field Replication
description: When Railgun Shell enters Disruption Field first time, it 100% splits into 1 additional Railgun Shell.

name: Powerful Blast
description: Aeroblast Shell DMG +50%.

name: Multiple Blast
description: Aeroblast Shell +1, DMG -15%.

name: Impact Enhancement
description: Aeroblast Shell knockback +50%, DMG +30%.

name: Shotgun Barrage
description: After Aeroblast fires, it launches 5 penetrating Shotgun Shells.

name: Floating Mine
description: Upon explosion, Aeroblast Shell leaves 2 Floating Mines in the explosion area.

name: Massive Explosion
description: Aeroblast Shell explosion range +70%.

name: Central Blast
description: Aeroblast Shells deal an additional high-energy explosion to the center area.

name: Extra Loading
description: For each enemy killed, Aeroblast fires 1 additional penetrating Shotgun Shell (MAX: 10).

name: Wide Minefield
description: Floating Mine +2, explosion DMG +25%.

name: Mine Shockwave
description: Floating Mine +2, knockback +100% (Unlock at Lv.14).

name: Chain Explosion
description: For each enemy hit by Aeroblast Shell explosion, explosion DMG +20% (MAX: 200%).

name: Range Extension
description: Aeroblast range +70%.

name: Secondary Explosion
description: Enemies hit by Aeroblast Shell will trigger an additional explosion after 1s (Unlock at Lv.18).

name: Piercing Blast
description: Aeroblast Shell Penetration +1.

name: Firewheel Summon
description: For each enemy hit by Aeroblast Shell explosion, it generates a Small Firewheel Drone.

name: Shotgun Penetration
description: Penetrating Shotgun Shells penetration DMG +50%, range +70%.

name: Gravity Bomb
description: Aeroblast shell DMG +100%, pulls enemies to the center before the explosion.

name: Shatter Impact
description: Aeroblast Shell creates two additional Ripping Lasers upon impact (Unlock at Lv.22).

name: Continuous Strike
description: Thunderbolt +1, Lightning Strike DMG -15%.

name: Swift Strike
description: Lightning Strike cooldown speed +10%, DMG +30%.

name: Lightning Boost

name: Lightning Paralysis

name: Chain Lightning
description: Lightning Strike trigger 1 Chain Lightning on hit (MAX: 5).

name: Lightning Expansion
description: Lightning Strike width +100%.

name: Slaughtering Lightning
description: Lightning Strike has a 60% chance to trigger a stationary small Thunderbolt when killing enemies.

name: Paralysis Extension
description: Duration of [Paralyze] effect caused by the Thunderbolt +100%.

name: Chain Expansion
description: Chain Lightning's target +4.

name: Paralyzing Shock
description: When the Thunderbolt triggers causes a [Paralyze] status, it triggers a small lightning strike every second (Unlock at Lv.22).

name: Extra Strike
description: Lightning Strike has a 50% chance to trigger 1 more time.

name: Thunder Chain
description: Enemies hit by Lightning Strike trigger a Small Chain Lightning each time they take damage.

name: Lightning Aftershock
description: There is a 50% chance to generate 1 Floating Mine by Thunderbolt hits enemies.

name: Lightning Trail
description: After Lightning Strike, leaving a flame trail during flight.

name: Life Erosion
description: Lightning Strike deals an additional 3% of the target's MAX HP as DMG when inflicting [Paralyze].

name: Chain Interference
description: Enemies hit by Chain Lightning receive [Paralyze] effect, Chain Lightning DMG +100%.

name: Lightning Teleportation
description: Enemies hit by Lightning Strike or Chain Lightning have a 50% chance to be teleported back.

name: Beam Boost

name: Efficient Beam
description: Beam cooldown speed +30%.

name: Beam Refraction
description: When the Beam hits a target, it generates Refracted Beams with +2 refractions.

name: Damage Increase
description: Beam deals increasing damage to the same target (MAX: 200%).

name: Beam Penetration
description: All Beams inflict [Vulnerable] effect to targets.

name: DMG Multiplier
description: Beam DMG interval -40%.

name: High-Frequency Beam
description: Beam duration +40%.

name: Stacking Damage
description: When the Beam switches targets, damage continues to increase.

name: Refraction Pull
description: Refraction +2, Refracted Beams will pull the hit target towards the center.

name: Slaughtering Beam
description: Every enemy killed by Beam, the Beam duration +10% (MAX: 100%).

name: Extra Beam

name: Target Explosion
description: Each hit from Beam triggers an explosion.

name: Disruptive Beam
description: Targets hit by Beam generate a small disruption field (Unlock at Lv.22).

name: Extreme Focus
description: Damage stacking cap increased to 400%.

name: Refraction Explosion

name: Beam Lightning

name: Matrix Resonance

name: Size Boost

name: Duration Extension

name: Flame Trail

name: Hold the Ground
description: Firewheel Drone stays for an additional 10s after it ends.

name: Killing Array

name: Blazing Trail
description: Flame Trail DMG +60%.

name: Killing Charge
description: For every 2 enemies directly killed by Firewheel Drone, Firewheel Drone CD -0.5s (MAX: 5s).

name: Combo Boost

name: Firewheel Ignition

name: Vortex Firewheel

name: Mini Size Boost
description: Mini Firewheel Drone DMG +50%, duration +50%.

name: Extended Trail
description: Flame Trail duration +2s (Unlock at Lv.14).

name: Extra Barrage

name: Blazing Pulse

name: Rapid Barrage
description: Wasps attack count +2.

name: Dense Swarm

description: Hive launches Wasp II after 2 volleys.

name: Echo Upgrade II

name: Wasp Evolution III
description: Wasp II evolves to III after 3 attacks.

name: Hive Mutation III
description: Hive has a 50% chance to launch Wasp III after 2 volleys.

name: Wasp Retrieval
description: Wasps have a 50% chance to return to Hive when destroyed (Max 5 stored).

name: Electro-Wasps

name: Aero Split
description: 60% chance for Wasp to split into 3 Small Railgun Shells upon hitting an enemy (Unlock at Lv.22).

name: Echo Upgrade III
description: Evolves echoes to Echo Wasp III.

name: Swarm Fury
description: Wasps +30% DMG after each attack.

name: Explosive Shells

name: Power Penetration
description: Railgun Shell penetration +3, knockback +100%.

name: Weak Spot Strike
description: Railgun Shell DMG increases with target HP (MAX: 150%).

name: Piercing Enhancement
description: Upon hitting the first enemy, Railgun Shell splits into 2 Mini Railgun Shells, with a 20% chance to split into 2 more.

name: Impact Spread
description: Railgun Shell explosion range +20% for each penetration.

name: Impact Boost
description: Railgun Shell explosion DMG +30% for each penetration.

description: Railgun Shell penetration +1 on kill (MAX: +5).

name: Piercing Mark

name: Surge Pierce

name: Split Mastery
description: All Railgun shells' split chance +40%.

name: Secondary Minefield

name: Electro Boost

name: Electro Chain

name: Charge Expansion

name: Trap Matrix

name: Electric Chain Surge

name: Electro Interference

name: Charge Destruction
description: Teslacoil charge time +0.5s, DMG increases with charge time.

name: Enhanced Matrix
description: Electric Matrix DMG +100%, duration +1s.

name: Expanded Shockwave
description: Teslacoil explosion range increased, outer DMG halved.

name: Charged Shock
description: During the Teslacoil charging time, it releases up to 2 High-voltage shock to nearby enemies every 0.25s.

name: Cooperative Beam

description: Charge time +1s.

name: Matrix Thunderbolt

name: Wide Field
description: Gravitational Field range +25%.

name: Extended Field

name: Static Wormhole

name: Small Black Hole
description: Creates a small black hole continuously pulling enemies for 5s after the Gravitational Field disappears.

name: Extended Pull
description: The further the Gravitational Field flies, the larger the range.

name: Field Amplification
description: Gravitational Field DMG +80%, pulling force +100%.

name: Wormhole Expansion
description: Portal entry range +100%.

name: Black Hole Expansion
description: Small Black Hole range +50%, pulling force +50%.

name: Wormhole Enhancement
description: Portal duration (entrance and exit) +100%.

name: Extra Field
description: Gravitational Field +1.

name: Extended Range
description: Gravitational Field flight distance doubled.

name: Field Reflection
description: All Gravitational Fields can reflect.

name: Field Disruption
description: Gravitational Field inflicts [Disruption] effect on hit.

name: Destructive Black Hole

name: Double Fission

name: Binary Stars
